# Quadim Public Skill Library

> 1227 professionally curated skill definitions for competence mapping, talent management, and workforce planning. Open taxonomy covering Technical, Management & Leadership, Analytical, Communication, Relationship, Physical, and Creative skills across 19 domains. Apache 2.0 License.

## Key Resources

- [Interactive site](https://techn-ai.github.io/Public-SkillDefinitions/): Browse, search, and explore all skills
- [Skill index (JSON)](https://techn-ai.github.io/Public-SkillDefinitions/data/skills-index.json): Lean index of all 1227 skills with metadata
- [Full skill data (JSON)](https://techn-ai.github.io/Public-SkillDefinitions/data/skills-full.json): Complete definitions with relationship graph
- [Graph data (JSON)](https://techn-ai.github.io/Public-SkillDefinitions/data/graph-edges.json): Relationship graph (401 nodes, 502 edges)
- [All skills (plain text)](https://techn-ai.github.io/Public-SkillDefinitions/llms-full.txt): Complete skill library for LLM consumption
- [GitHub repository](https://github.com/Techn-ai/Public-SkillDefinitions): Source data and site code

## Schema

Each skill has: id (UUID), name, description, coversElement (classification), skillType, matchesArea (multi), relatesTo / isCompositeOf / isExtensionOf (relationship graph), skillOwnerUsername, createdAt.

## Classification

- Technical (605 skills)
- Management & Leadership (244 skills)
- Unclassified (166 skills)
- Analytical (105 skills)
- Communication (44 skills)
- Relationship (34 skills)
- Physical (15 skills)
- Creative (14 skills)

## Domains

Software Development, AI & Machine Learning, Data & Analytics, Leadership & Executive, Cloud & Infrastructure, Security & Cybersecurity, Networking & IoT, Architecture & Design, DevOps & Platform Engineering, Communication & Soft Skills, Finance & Accounting, HR & People, Project & Product Management, Governance & Compliance, Blockchain & Web3, Design & UX, Testing & Quality, ESG & Sustainability

## Data provenance

Skills were authored by human curators (Selina Quadim, Thor Henning Hetland, and team) and Frøya — Quadim's AI co-worker agent. Date range: May 2022 – April 2025.

## License

Apache 2.0 — https://github.com/Techn-ai/Public-SkillDefinitions/blob/main/LICENSE
